abouthome-startup-cache-5.userFacingDescription: The about:home startup cache tries to make loading the default homepage in Firefox faster after it first starts.

$l10n.comment: This title plays on the repetition of open, and that might not work if your locale doesn't translate 'Open source'. You have the option to keep this string in English, if you think it can be easily understood and work well as a slogan, or use an alternative as a reference for translation: 'Support people over profits'.

$l10n.text: You’re one click away from supporting the only non-profit-backed, people-first browser made for everyone, everywhere.

def-en-fox-doodle-set-to-default-early-d.userFacingName: def EN Fox Doodle Set to default: Early day - Graphics
def-en-fox-doodle-set-to-default-early-d.userFacingDescription: This experiment displays a spotlight asking new Firefox users if they'd like to set Firefox as their default browser.

en-CA.fox-doodle-driving-title: Give Firefox a proper test drive
en-CA.fox-doodle-trackers-title: Keep pesky trackers off your tail
en-CA.fox-doodle-driving-subtitle: For peak performance, keep your new favorite indie browser one click away while you take it for a spin.
en-CA.fox-doodle-campfire-subtitle: You’re one click away from supporting the only non-profit-backed, people-first browser made for everyone, everywhere.
en-CA.fox-doodle-trackers-subtitle: Say goodbye to annoying ad trackers and settle into a safer, speedy internet experience.

firefox-accounts-toolbar-button-badge.userFacingDescription: This experiment measures the impact of showing the Firefox Accounts toolbar button by default for signed-out users.

product-insight-telemetry-via-server-kno.userFacingDescription: Testing out the data and insights capture in the awesome bar.
